comments.body:
Installing from the source distribution tarball is broken due to a missing file. I've attempted to fix this as well as distribution of the license file in https://github.com/maximtrp/scikit-posthocs/pull/36

You need to either push out a new release of the package that fixes this or install from a Github release. I think the former is preferable, but I'll leave it up to you since I don't know your release cycle constraints.
I have pushed out a new release to PyPi as you suggested. Thank you!
Thanks for merging and making the update. Currently failing since the sha256 needs to be updated for the new release.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@
source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/scikit-posthocs-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 403584cb6b8863a0385397b104c6f3a22c8e7d924fa7d4050452e4fa36ffdf65
